todos.title: Be a Magician
todos.body: Spend 90 percent of the time getting others engaged and building suspense.  Only 10 percent should be the trick.  Let their imaginations run wild.  Build the storyline behind the product.

todos.title: Cause
todos.body: Make it about the cause, not the entrepreneur.

todos.title: Play to Your Strengths
todos.body: Let people see what you are good at.

todos.title: Be decisive
todos.body: Know the answer to every question.

todos.title: Compensate Correctly
todos.body: Give people what they are owed.

todos.title: Show Courage
todos.body: Be strong and patient when things aren’t great.

todos.title: Transference
todos.body: Be like a parent or brother.
